Thank you for your interest in sci-fi films! Here are a few recommendations from my database:

  1. "Interstellar" - directed by Christopher Nolan and featuring an ensemble cast including Matthew McConaughey, Anne Hathaway, Jessica Chastain, Michael Caine, Bill Skarsgard, David Warshauer and Simon Pegg.
  2. "The Matrix" - directed by Lana Wachowski and written by Wachowski and Steve Haldane. It stars Keanu Reeves, Laurence Fishburne, Hugo Weaving, Carole Streamer, Sam Rockwell, Bill Nighy and Stephen Hawking.
  3. "Inception" - directed by Christopher Nolan and starring Leonardo DiCaprio, Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Tom Hardy, Ellen Page, Ken Watanabe, Hideo Nakamori, Seiichi Itaya, Shinji Aramaki, Tsutomu Hayashi and Masayuki Yamada.

I hope you find these recommendations enjoyable!
